div.div: harm caused by cold in all four seasons

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold in all four seasons

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 21: 治四時傷 寒初覺，桂心湯方 , “For treating a first awareness of harm caused by cold in all four seasons : the recipe for the decoction with gui xin ”.
